mapper.sql: sale_item_id, sale_id, product_id, quantity, price, subtotal
mapper.select: select si.sale_item_id, si.sale_id, si.product_id, si.quantity, si.price, si.subtotal, p.product_name, p.barcode from sale_items si left join products p on si.product_id = p.product_id where si.sale_id = #{saleId} order by si.sale_item_id

select si.sale_item_id, si.sale_id, si.product_id, si.quantity, si.price, si.subtotal, s.sale_time, s.order_number from sale_items si left join sales s on si.sale_id = s.sale_id where si.product_id = #{productId} and s.status = 'completed' order by s.sale_time desc
select product_id, sum(quantity) as total_quantity, sum(subtotal) as total_amount, count(distinct sale_id) as order_count from sale_items where product_id = #{productId} group by product_id
